long_description: This innovative Gerber multi-tool combines industrial-grade strength and professional functionality in a compact, easy-to-use design. Sliding-jaw pliers can be deployed with one hand. Tough, stainless-steel handle and components withstand the test of time. Includes scissors, straight and serrated blades, bottle opener, can opener, wire cutters, two flathead screwdrivers, cross-point screwdriver and saw. Saf.T.Plus(TM) locking system ensures tools stay locked in the open position. Includes durable, ballistic nylon sheath with rip-and-stick flap closure for carrying and storage.
short_description: This innovative Gerber multi-tool combines industrial-grade strength and professional functionality in a compact, easy-to-use design.
